sentences.en: A player with ball in hand must play from the balk.
sentences.cn: 拿球的选手必须从开球区开始打.

sentences.en: Balk the purpose of those who threaten us.
sentences.cn: 遏止那些威胁我们的人的目的.

sentences.en: Even biology undergraduates may balk at animal experiments.
sentences.cn: 即使是生物专业的大学生都可能会反对动物实验。

sentences.en: Have you ever worked with a therapist, or would you balk at that?
sentences.cn: 你和治疗师工作过吗?你回避他们 吗 ?

sentences.en: He shored up the wall with a thick balk of wood.
sentences.cn: 他用一根粗大的木头把墙撑住.

sentences.en: It's all dead easy if Rosy don't balk when the flag drops.
sentences.cn: 在要行动时如果罗西不坏事那绝对不是难事.

sentences.en: Make not a balk of good ground.
Many people balk at this danger.
sentences.cn: 许多人看到这种危险便畏惧不前.

sentences.en: My horse jump across the deep ravine, but all the others balk.
sentences.cn: 我的马跃过深谷, 但其余的马都突然停止不动.

sentences.en: People may balk at the sight of a sea of wind turbines.
sentences.cn: 面对一大片涡轮机海洋,人们可能会感觉不那么舒服.

sentences.en: That was a balk to us.
They often still balk at being stigmatized as weird.
sentences.cn: 实际上,他们依然害怕别人指责自己“怪里怪气”.

sentences.en: To emancipate all mankind, we will balk at no sacrifice . even that of our lives.
sentences.cn: 为了全人类的解放, 即使牺牲生命也在所不惜.

sentences.en: To stop short and turn restively from side to side ; balk.
sentences.cn: 徘徊不前停止不前且踌躇不前; 畏缩不前.

sentences.en: We get strong indications that his agent would balk at that request.
sentences.cn: 我们得到的强烈暗示是他的经纪人会回避那个要求.

sentences.en: While the United States and Canada balk, other countries are clearing Arctic space for the industry.
sentences.cn: 在美国和加拿大逡巡不前的时候，其他国家正在为进军北极清理障碍。

sentences.en: Yet the more docile horse would balk every time he came to the edge.
sentences.cn: 然而那匹温顺的马每当走到壕沟边缘的时候,都踯躅不前.

words.tran_cn: 停蹄不前的；倔强的；不愿干的

trans.tran_cn: 阻碍，妨碍，错误，挫折，田埂，[体]假动作

trans.tran_en: to not want to do or try something, because it seems difficult, unpleasant, or frightening

trans.tran_cn: 畏缩不前，犹豫，（指马）不肯跑，拒绝，[体]假动作
